document.full_text: the vancouver canucks' road to the stanley cup finals has been defined not only by clutch goals and awe-inspiring team play, but also by the team's passionate and unpredictable fans.
document.title: as finals approach, vancouver catches canucks fever
lines_and_colors: the vancouver canucks' road to the stanley cup finals has been defined not only by clutch goals and awe-inspiring team play, but also by the team's passionate and unpredictable fans.
